enclosure-glass.name: Glass Enclosure

recommended.description: Front-opening glass enclosure with better quality

ideal.description: Premium glass enclosure with ventilation and stands

enclosure-glass.notes: Excellent visibility. Good humidity retention. Prices vary significantly by size and retailer.

enclosure-pvc.name: PVC Enclosure

recommended.description: Quality PVC enclosure with better seals

ideal.description: Premium PVC construction with optimal humidity control

enclosure-pvc.notes: Superior humidity retention and durability. Professional quality. Higher cost than glass but better for moisture-sensitive species.

enclosure-screen.name: Screen Enclosure

recommended.description: Quality aluminum screen with better frame

ideal.description: Premium aluminum frame with locking doors

enclosure-screen.notes: Maximum airflow. Excellent for low-humidity species. Most budget-friendly option.
